name: get_history_of_item
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tibia_items.
Tool description: this API will helps you find tibia items princes around the worlds

All endpoints to get items values, this is all we try to get on day.

Discord Channel for talk.
https://discord.gg/bwZGtaz56P
API description: In this enpoint we can deliver the history of item.
you will need to request in this pattern.

Key: NameItem::World::TypeItem
Key: Gold Token::Wizera::Valuable

Date:2022-01-01
Date: yyyy-MM-dd

Date: 2022-01
Date: yyyy-MM

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the item history. Expected formats: 'yyyy-MM-dd' or 'yyyy-MM'.

key.description: The unique identifier for the item, formatted as 'NameItem::World::TypeItem'.
